title: Medical emergency simulator - ABCDESim
tasks: In charge of researching and defining the initial architecture to embed custom scenarios in the system
Co-responsible for the production's workflow from design implementation to beta release

award.description: This project was nominated at the Dutch Game Awards 2012 and won the Dutch eLearning Award in 2013
award.title: Dutch eLearning Award

projectDescription: The project was made by IjsFontein in collaboration with Erasmus MC University
It shows a virtual emergency room where the state of a patient needs to be stabilized within 15 minutes
The game is used as a training software for medical students
The software integrates a MIT algorithm to simulate the body's state and it's reaction to drugs
team: AS3 development: Brian Heylin and myself
